src:
Fakhri Husaini Fokus Bawa Timnas U-19 ke Piala Asia
06 Nov 2019, 04:35 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pelatih Timnas U-19 Indonesia, Fakhri Husaini, tidak masalah bila tidak lagi melatih Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi dan kawan-kawan di Piala Dunia U-20 2021. Para pemain yang kini berada di Timnas U-19 diprediksi menjadi materi pemain bagi Timnas U-20 di Piala Dunia 2021. “Buat saya tidak jadi masalah. Saya tidak memikirkan itu,” kata Fakhri di Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Ia berharap siapa pun pelatih terpenting Timnas Indonesia bisa bersaing Piala Dunia U-20. Apalagi, kata Fakhri, Indonesai telah lolos secara otomatis dengan status tuan rumah.
“Tugas saya bukan ke sana (Piala Dunia U-20). Tugas saya sementara di Kualifikasi Piala Asia,” ucap Fakhri.
Sebelumnya, Sekretaris Jenderal PSSI, Ratu Tisha Destria, menegaskan persiapan membentuk tim nasional yang akan berlaga di Piala Dunia U-20 2021 sudah sesuai dengan roadmap yang dimiliki PSSI untuk menuju Olimpiade 2024 di Paris, Prancis. Roadmap yang telah dipersiapkan oleh PSSI itu merupakan Elite Pro Academy yang sudah digelar sejak 2017 lalu, di mana kategori U-16 menjadi yang perdana.
"Kami membangun ekosistem dan kompetisi yang baik untuk anak-anak tersebut. Bicara soal Timnas Indonesia U-19 saat ini, tim itu merupakan anak-anak yang sedang berkompetisi di Elite Pro Academy, di Garuda Select, dan di Piala Suratin U-17," tutur Tisha.
Timnas Indonesia U-19 asuhan Fakhri Husaini bisa dibilang merupakan tim yang bakal dipersiapkan untuk tampil di Piala Dunia U-20 2021, di mana mereka telah dibentuk sejak Timnas Indonesia U-18 yang tampil di Piala AFF U-18 2019. Kini mereka akan menjalani kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020.
Ratu Tisha pun menegaskan, Timnas Indonesia U-20 akan mulai dipersiapkan lebih matang untuk Piala Dunia U-20 2021 pada 2020. "Mari melihat satu tahun sebelum Piala Dunia bergulir, mereka akan menjadi front runner untuk tampil di Piala Dunia U-20 2021," ujarnya.

IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
Fakhri Husaini Focuses Bringing the U-19 national team to the Asian Cup
Nov 06 2019, 04:35 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian U-19 national team coach, Fakhri Husaini, it doesn't matter if he no longer trains Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi and his friends at the U-20 World Cup 2021. Players who are now in the U-19 national team are predicted to be material a player for the U-20 national team in the 2021 World Cup. "For me it's not a problem. I didn't think about that, "Fakhri said in Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
He hopes that whoever is the most important coach of the Indonesian national team can compete in the U-20 World Cup. Moreover, said Fakhri, Indonesia has escaped automatically with the status of the host.
"My duty is not to go there (U-20 World Cup). My job is temporary in the Asian Cup Qualification, "said Fakhri.
Previously, PSSI Secretary General, Ratu Tisha Destria, emphasized that preparations to form a national team that would compete in the 2021 U-20 World Cup were in accordance with the PSSI roadmap for the 2024 Olympics in Paris, France. The roadmap that has been prepared by PSSI is an Elite Pro Academy which has been held since 2017, where the U-16 category is the first.
"We are building a good ecosystem and competition for these children. Speaking of the current Indonesian U-19 national team, the team are children who are competing in the Elite Pro Academy, in Garuda Select, and in the U-17 Suratin Cup, "said Tisha.
Fakhri Husaini's Indonesia U-19 national team is arguably a team that will be prepared to appear at the 2021 U-20 World Cup, where they have been formed since the Indonesian U-18 national team who appeared in the 2019 AFF U-18 Cup. Now they will undergo AFC U-19 2020 qualifying cup.
Ratu Tisha also stressed, the Indonesia U-20 national team will begin to be prepared more thoroughly for the 2021 U-20 World Cup in 2020. "Let's see one year before the World Cup starts, they will be front runners to appear in the 2021 U-20 World Cup, "he said.

IRSYAN HASYIM
